patthana1.21:52.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—ajjhattā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.21:53.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—bahiddhā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:54.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati,
patthana1.21:54.1_10: ajjhatte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati,
patthana1.21:55.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—paro ajjhattaṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ …
patthana1.21:55.1_1: ajjhatte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati,
patthana1.21:55.1_9: ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:56.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—paro dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati,
patthana1.21:57.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti.

patthana1.21:58.1_6: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā …pe…
patthana1.21:58.1_9: ajjhatte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,

patthana1.21:78.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā …pe….

patthana1.21:79.1_2: Sahajātā—ajjhattā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:79.1_3: Nānākkhaṇikā—ajjhattā cetanā vipākānaṁ ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:80.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana1.21:80.1_2: Sahajātā—bahiddhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:80.1_3: Nānākkhaṇikā—bahiddhā cetanā vipākānaṁ bahiddhā khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:81.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.21:82.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—ajjhattā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.21:82.1_3: ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:83.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:84.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo (pavattipaṭisandhi) bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:85.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:86.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro
patthana1.21:86.1_1: āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:87.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro
patthana1.21:87.1_1: ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.21:89.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.21:90.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.21:90.1_3: Sahajāto—ajjhatto eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.21:90.1_13: Pacchājātā—ajjhattā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.21:91.1_8: Ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro bahiddhā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:92.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.21:93.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana1.21:93.1_7: Bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:94.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana1.21:94.1_1: Purejātaṁ—bahiddhā rūpāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ cakkhu ca ajjhattassa cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.21:94.1_2: bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ kāyāyatanañca ajjhattassa kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:94.1_4: bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ vatthu ca ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:94.1_5: Āhāraṁ—ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca ajjhattassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:95.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana1.21:95.1_1: Purejātaṁ—ajjhattaṁ rūpāyatanañca bahiddhā cakkhāyatanañca bahiddhā cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.21:95.1_2: ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca bahiddhā kāyāyatanañca bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:95.1_3: Ajjhattaṁ rūpāyatanañca bahiddhā vatthu ca bahiddhā khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.21:95.1_4: ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca bahiddhā vatthu ca bahiddhā khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:95.1_5: Āhāraṁ—ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:96.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.21:99.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.21:100.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.21:101.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.21:102.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.21:103.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana1.21:104.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammassa purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
